extendedInfo.description: Love all of those android games that are basically just filling bars, but hate having to deal will all those vampire/mafia/etc. themes?Bar filler delivers all the bar filling you love, with none of the distracting theme content!

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.comment: This game is boring u press a bar so it turns red and fills up WOW HOW FUN
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THIS GAME IS AMAZING!!!
reviews.comment: seriously, five stars does not do it justice! this game is so original & challenging. i love all the different levels & i\342\200\231m addicted. honestly brian, when are you going to release a paid version because i would definite give you some money in return for more levels - i just can\342\200\231t get enough! also, this game is really well presented: the red & black colour scheme makes it really dramatic so that i feel like i\342\200\231m really being challenged when i play the levels; it\342\200\231s like i\342\200\231m a spy or something! BUY THIS GAME!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HELP!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m stuck on level 2, hint please
reviews.author: A Google User
